column9: i live in northern california and cannot find a doctor to help me with my 20+ years of insomnia.i take 60mgs of restoril a night even tho the highest dose is supposed to be 30mg , but even the 60 doesn't work anymore.i have tried ambien and it is the worst sleep aid ever , more like a bad trip than a good night's sleep . i sleep maybe 3 hours a night and am desperate to find a doctor willing to at least try me on secobarbital.all the reviews on this site have been favourable and i believe it would help me .any suggestions or doctors listening out there?and i am not soliciting , i am merely begging for help or advice . i need sleep . thanx .

column2: Seconal X, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This is the best sleep aid of all time! Secobarbital is a "retro" drug that's been around since the 1940's. It's rarly scripted these days because it has a long history of addiction and overdose, but if used correctly Seconal is safe. I'm really lucky to get this med and it works wonders at putting me asleep. I take it at least 5 hours after eating so it will work better and faster. The only downside is that it can make you sleepy during the day and sometimes made my speach slurry.
